pages.text: Using the powers of The Light, Nazars are commonly used to protect against $(l:bewitchment:curses/conducting_curses)Curses$().$(br2)When worn, they will cut the duration of any $(l:bewitchment:curses/conducting_curses)Curse$() in half. $(br)this requires about half of the wearer's $(l:bewitchment:introduction/altars#internalme)ME$().
